thread.section_title: Solid Apollo LED Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solid Apollo LED | solidapollo.com
thread.title: Dennis
thread.title_full: Solid Apollo LED reviewed by Dennis

author: Dennis
title: Dennis
text:
Ordered the 24Volt RGBW Waterproof LED Strip lights, kind of pricey but you get what you pay for. Strips are high quality and well made and are brighter then others. The only problem I had was with the shipping. Solid Apollo shipped with FedEx and had a signature required and someone had to be there for delivery. I was not informed of this so the package was not delivered as I was not home at the time of delivery (stepped out for 45 min. and that is when FedEx came). If your going to require A signature please state that in RED letters when checking out so people know.
Thank You.
